content: The National Eisteddfod of Wales is held annually in Wales, and the location changes every year. In 2021, the event will be held in Llantwit Major, a town in the Vale of Glamorgan, South Wales. The dates for the event are August 30th to September 4th, 2021. The Eisteddfod is a week-long festival, and it features a wide range of events and activities, including Welsh language competitions, music and dance performances, visual art exhibitions, and much more. If you're interested in attending the festival, you can find more information about tickets, events, and locations on the National Eisteddfod of Wales' official website.
